Description of incident: A laptop was stolen which contained              personally identifiable information for clients of Marine Corps Community              Services' New Parent Support Program. The laptop may contain names,              ranks, Social Security numbers, dates of birth, children's names and              mailing addresses of U.S. military service members, U.S. government              employees and Status of Forces Agreement personnel on Okinawa and              Marine Corps Air Station Iwakuni. It does not include driver's license              numbers or bank and credit card information.
